name: Owl's Midnight Journey
description:
Night falls, and the feathered hunter goes on a journey through the beautiful landscapes of the night woods looking for adventure, where it will face many dangers and test its agility, dexterity and the ability to fly through the wilds of impassable forest in search of prey, so as not to weaken and fall from hunger! Perform tricks, collect mysterious moonlight, perform tasks, become a danger to mice and let them forget how to go for a walk at night! After all the night is an owls time!

FEATURES
• Collect the moonlight!
• Hunt for mice!
• Open up new kinds of Owls!
• Perform tricks!

Go on a journey with your owl and enjoy the game!
